High-profile individuals—CEOs, politicians, celebrities—stand out because their personal and professional lives are often intertwined, creating a wealth of exploitable data. I look at their social media activity, public events, and network connections to identify patterns or vulnerabilities. For organizations, I focus on sectors with high-value data: finance, healthcare, and government institutions are gold mines due to the sensitive information they hold.
